snippet: Professor Ostrom’s prizewinning work examined how people collaborate and organize themselves to manage common resources like forests or fisheries, even when governments are not involved.
abstract: Elinor Ostrom, only woman to win the Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Science, dies at age 78.
lead_paragraph: Professor Ostrom’s prizewinning work examined how people collaborate and organize themselves to manage common resources like forests or fisheries, even when governments are not involved.

headline.seo: Elinor Ostrom, Winner of Nobel in Economics, Dies at 78
headline.main: Elinor Ostrom, Winner of Nobel in Economics, Dies at 78
headline.print_headline: Elinor Ostrom, Winner of Nobel in Economics, Dies at 78
